==Detailed Show Notes==

Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/10/10/episode-604-october-5-2021 Episode #604: October 5, 2021]</ref>:

*Alex has found "the smoking gun of smoking guns of smoking guns," which turns out to be a [https://www.c-span.org/video/?465845-1%2Funiversal-flu-vaccine 2019 C-SPAN video] that he makes up a bunch of stuff about
*Alex thinks that [https://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/home-news/rothschild-libel-why-has-it-taken-200-years-anti-semitic-slur-emerged-battle-waterloo-be-dismissed-10216101.html anti-Semitic smears against Nathan Rothschild] are real history
*Instead of really focusing on the smoking gun C-SPAN video, Alex interviews Ted Nugent, Dr. Bartlett, and a random comedian who [https://www.dailydot.com/debug/comedian-tweets-imperil-military-base-tour-derek-richards/ got kicked off a tour] for bad tweets
*Alex cites [https://www.washingtonpost.com/health/2020/04/22/coronavirus-ventilators-survival/ an old statistic] about ventilators, which is [https://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2020/05/15/856768020/new-evidence-suggests-covid-19-patients-on-ventilators-usually-survive devoid of context]
*The NIH's [https://files.covid19treatmentguidelines.nih.gov/guidelines/covid19treatmentguidelines.pdf Covid-19 Treatment Guidelines]
